html:
The agonizing wait for answers continues at a Kentucky candle factory where searchers are combing through wreckage after a tornado struck

Iran appears to be preparing for a space launch as negotiations continue in Vienna over its tattered nuclear deal with world powers

Veteran anchor Chris Wallace has left Fox News after 18 years for CNN

Inflation is painfully high, but this hopefully is close to as bad as it gets

A coalition of California restaurants and grocery stores has filed a lawsuit to block implementation of a new farm animal welfare law

Search efforts at an Amazon facility in Illinois where at least six people were killed in a tornado are expected to take several days

A photo from a tornado-damaged home in Kentucky landed almost 130 miles away in Indiana

Autumn Kirks and her boyfriend, Lannis Ward, were both working the night shift at a candle factory in Mayfield, Kentucky, when a massive tornado struck

Prime Minister Boris Johnson says that Britain faces a "tidal wave" of infections from the omicron coronavirus variant and he has announced a huge increase in booster vaccinations to strengthen defenses against it

Vicente Fernández, a beloved Mexican singer who was awarded three Grammys and nine Latin Grammys and inspired a new generation of performers, including his son Alejandro Fernández, has died
